title: The Truth About Staying Faithful in Marriage
description:
Marriage comes with many challenges, but there’s one that we often don’t talk about — staying faithful to your spouse. Judah and Chelsea sit down for a refreshingly honest conversation about cheating. They share some conversation starters for couples who want to approach the issue with integrity and grace, and reveal some moments their own faithfulness was put to the test.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
